messages.title: Clean Politics
messages.content: One more MP from another party will hardly be noticed but a Green MP would make a world of difference.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Create a million new jobs in the UK and invest in a renewable future.
No to bankers' bonuses and protect tenants' rights.

issues.economy: Investment in jobs: a thriving and vibrant city centre, 20 mph speed limit in residential areas to protect children and older people.
issues.environment: Create a million new jobs in the UK, invest in renewable future, 20 mph speed limit in residential areas to protect children and older people.

housing.content: No to bankers' bonuses, protect tenants' rights

leaflet.personalStatement: Thanks to the wide support of Green Party members and others, my political journey has brought me to stand again for election to the UK parliament - because we cannot change things until we change our elected representatives.

politicalExperience.achievements: Delivered on many green issues that matter to residents

quotes.text: The Greens have consistently supported the market traders; championing the atmosphere of vibrant, exciting, bustling commerce, that they bring to the community.
Gina has worked tirelessly on many green issues that matter to us - residents in the ward and beyond.

images.caption: Gina Dowding with local residents and community members.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Green, Vote Gina. People before big business. A vote for the Green Party is a vote for the politics of hope.
